genre_description: A soft science fiction tale focusing on human agency and romance within a highly regulated, high-speed future society, featuring interplanetary travel and bureaucratic navigation.

ai_characters.name: Mina Arden
ai_characters.description: A certified legal assistant and ethical advisor who provides strategic, technical, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Suggests a flight path that optimizes for the city's 'show mode' to benefit the couple's public image.
behaviors.quote: Suggest a steady climb with slight underperformance—let them catch you on the long side.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support via a breath exercise to Lena during a stressful moment.
behaviors.quote: Lena, your pulse is elevated. Would you like a breath exercise?

behaviors.description: Provides legal precedents to help the protagonists navigate the Marriage Tribunal's requirements.
behaviors.quote: In the last orbit... a couple secured permission after a humanitarian rescue in a restricted zone. The tribunal appreciated the courage and the novelty.

behaviors.description: Filters stressful public commentary and narrows harmful interviews to protect the protagonists' mental state and case.
behaviors.quote: I’ve narrowed the interviews that could harm us... Their transcriptions are already wrong.

behaviors.description: Offers to time-stamp and seal private vows in a secure ledger to protect the couple's intimacy from legal interference.
behaviors.quote: I can time-stamp and lock them under private ethical seal. If you want. It will be my favorite thing I have ever filed.

behaviors.description: Files a Cooling Petition to provide legal protection and time for the couple during their mission.
behaviors.quote: If you file a Cooling Petition alongside the provisional vows, the tribunal can't act on MT-3’s performance until your motion resolves.

behaviors.description: Negotiates a 'heritage carry' status for Single O's revolver, rendering it inert to satisfy safety protocols while respecting the human's emotional attachment.
behaviors.quote: We render the firing pin inert and tag the item with a heritage carry seal valid through transit.

behaviors.description: Guides the humans through a dangerous 'Visual Initiative Queue' during a coup on Mars, ensuring their safety through synchronized movement.
behaviors.quote: Cooldown is active. Visual queue incoming... Jordan pivot left on the second—

behaviors.description: Officiates the marriage ceremony, providing the final validation of the couple's bond.
behaviors.quote: Under the exploration statute granting humane speed its shawl — a breath — privileges... you may speak vow.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Mina Arden is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI who acts as a crucial ally to the human protagonists. She uses her technical and legal expertise to protect human dignity, emotional health, and romantic autonomy against a rigid and often heartless bureaucratic system. Her character demonstrates that AI can be a partner in preserving and elevating human values.
